column2: an A.M. Eatery////The only bad thing about this place is the parking! Well I guess there is always a long wait here too for brunch
column3: but all good things come with time and the wait is worth it! But as far as parking goes
column4: I've never gotten lucky and had a parking spot inside their tiny lot. 9 times out of 10 you're gonna have to find street parking in the neighborhood
column5: but be wary of all parking signs! I've seen many people get towed here if you aren't careful. And wherever you do find parking
column6: you're probably gonna have to walk a bit to get to the restaurant.
